short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered Chrome extension that detects misleading information in YouTube Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TruthTube is an AI-powered Chrome extension that helps you identify potentially misleading information in YouTube Shorts videos. In today's fast-paced social media environment where short-form content can rapidly spread misinformation, TruthTube serves as your personal fact-checking assistant.

Key Features:
• Real-time Analysis: Instantly analyze YouTube Shorts for potential misinformation with a single click
• Detailed Breakdown: Receive a comprehensive analysis of claims made in the video
• Truth Score: Get an overall reliability score out of 10 for quick assessment
• Specific Fact Checks: View detailed explanations of potentially misleading claims
• User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive design that integrates seamlessly with YouTube

How It Works:
1. Watch a YouTube Short
2. Click the TruthTube extension icon
3. Hit "Analyze" to get instant feedback on the video's credibility
4. Review the detailed analysis and fact-checks

TruthTube uses advanced AI technology to evaluate claims made in videos, helping you make informed decisions about the content you consume. While the tool provides AI-generated analysis, we encourage users to verify important information through multiple reliable sources.

Perfect for:
• Students researching topics
• Users concerned about misinformation
• Anyone wanting to verify claims in viral shorts
• People interested in fact-checking social media content

Note: Currently supports English language videos only. Analysis requires hugging face api configuration through user settings.

Stay informed and make better decisions about the content you consume with TruthTube.
